title: Am i the only one that cant log in?
body: Riot stated that there is a problem that causes login atempts to fail and they are workig to fix that. Has anyone had this problem and fixed it? I tried the hextech repair tool and the usual restarting, i really dont feel like reinstalling lol since it takes forever and riot has probably solved the problem by the time i install it again. Is there anything else u can do besides wait for riot to fix the problem?

replies.body: You weren't the only one for sure! We've patched up the problem and you should be able to login now, but there's a [**discussion going on**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue) where you can get more information about what happened if you still can't get in.

Heya Goat,

This thread here has the updates for the login issues! --> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue
